title: DG Islamic Organization for Food Security calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 15 (APP):Director General of Islamic Organisation for Food Security Yerlan Baidaulet called on caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar here on Friday.
The delegation of Islamic Organization for Food Security welcomed the measures being taken under Special Investment Facilitation Council (SIFC) in Pakistan.
The delegation also assured its full cooperation in this regard to the Pakistan government.
